user_query: My company is organizing a team-building retreat and we need some innovative activities to enhance collaboration. Can you suggest random team-building exercises and challenges that would foster teamwork and communication? Additionally, I'd like to read articles about successful team-building retreats for inspiration. And, if you can, find hotels with spacious conference rooms and outdoor team-building facilities.

TaskList.description: Research and generate a list of innovative team-building exercises and challenges.
Fetch articles about successful team-building retreats for inspiration.
Search for hotels that offer spacious conference rooms and outdoor team-building facilities.
